title: Overland run-off: eMAST-R-Package 2.0, 0.01 degree, Australian Coverage, 1970-2012
location:

project: https://my.nci.org.au/mancini/login?next=/mancini/project/rr9

path: /g/data/rr9/eMAST_data/eMAST-R-Package/eMAST-R-Package_v1-1_overland-runoff_monthly_0-01deg_1970-2012
description:
Monthly overland run-off for the Australian continent. Modelled using eMAST-R-Package 2.0.Official metadata and access to the data is via the NCI geonetwork record in related identifiers.

Lineage: Monthly overland run-off for the Australian continent has been produced using eMAST-R-package 2.0.
